name: Infrastructure Resources
description: Pay for infrastructure resources by the hour with no long-term commitments. This frees you from the costs and complexities of planning, purchasing, and maintaining hardware. Transform large fixed costs into much smaller variable costs.

name: Quickstart Services
description: Get help with your transition, or simply help speed up the process of adopting our enterprise cloud platform.

products.name: Quickstart Express
products.descriptionHtml: Deployment and training services

products.name: Quickstart Advanced
products.descriptionHtml: Deployment services and best practice consultation to maximize ROI.

products.name: Quickstart Enterprise
products.descriptionHtml: Tailored for strategic and/or enterprise orgs who require complex onboarding and/or applicable to customers who have extended onboarding requirements.

products.name: Quickstart SafeHaven Onboarding
products.descriptionHtml: Includes 6 Recovery VM setup. Any additional Recovery VM setup is $325 per VM, a one-time charge.

name: Service Tasks
description: Our team of network engineers have deep operational expertise to quickly and efficiently perform common platform activities. Just give us the details on your request, and within one business day, we'll reply with an estimate, along with a projected completion date for the task. Service task estimation and duties are performed during business hours, 9 a.m.–5 p.m. Pacific Time.

products.name: VM Import
products.descriptionHtml: Take a customer virtual machine and convert to either (a) a running virtual machine or (b) a reusable template. Servers converted. The customer will be asked for details about which account, group, VLAN, and storage type to apply to the imported server.
products.details: Best option for virtual appliances or other OVF files that do not meet self-service import requirements listed here. Take a customer virtual machine and convert to either (a) a running virtual machine or (b) a reusable template. Servers converted. The customer will be asked for details about which account, group, VLAN, and storage type to apply to the imported server.
products.prerequisite: Export virtual machine in OVF format. Must be an Operating System currently supported on the CenturyLink Cloud. For full list of requirements for custom imports, see this KB article.

products.name: Deploy Dedicated Load Balancer
products.descriptionHtml: Customer can request dedicated Netscaler, HAProxy, and F5 devices for their accounts. These are best suited to customers who want control over routing management for public or private traffic.
products.details: CenturyLink Cloud offers self-service shared load balancers. For customers who desire control over routing management for public or private traffic, however, they can request dedicated Netscaler, HAProxy, and F5 devices for their accounts.
products.prerequisite: For load balancers that require licensing, the customer must provide licensing information or approve CenturyLink Cloud to purchase on their behalf.

products.name: Deploy Custom OpenVPN Servers or Configurations
products.descriptionHtml: CenturyLink's OpenVPN solution supports up to approximately 19 active sessions. Customers who need more than 19 sessions, a custom port, or a configuration in a secondary data center can request this work item.
products.details: CenturyLink's OpenVPN solution supports up to approximately 19 active sessions. Customers who need more than 19 sessions, a custom port, or a configuration in a secondary data center can request this work item.

products.name: Deploy Site-to-Site VPN Tunnels or Direct Connect
products.descriptionHtml: Provision specialized site-to-site tunnels for customers or connect CenturyLink Cloud to hardware in the same data center via Direct Connect.
products.details: Our team will provision specialized site-to-site tunnels for customers.

products.name: Deploy VMWare Virtual Appliance
products.descriptionHtml: Add virtual appliances to an account.
products.details: Add pre-packaged applications to your CenturyLink Cloud deployment—including AlertLogic, Twinstrata Gateway, and Riverbed WAN accelerator.
products.prerequisite: Customer must already have purchased licenses for appliances, or approve of CenturyLink Cloud purchasing licenses on their behalf.

products.name: Data Import/Export
products.descriptionHtml: For customers with large data sets to add to (or extract from) the cloud, this content can be distributed via removable media or FTP. This may include data files, virtual machine hard drives (export), or unstructured content. For export where no removable media provided by customer, cost of media added to invoice.
products.details: Transferring large amounts of data into—and out of—CenturyLink Cloud is a common request. For customers with large data sets to add to (or extract from) the cloud, this content can be distributed via removable media or FTP. This may include data files, virtual machine hard drives (export), or unstructured content.
products.note: For export where no removable media provided by customer, cost of media added to invoice.
products.prerequisite: For import, customer provides removable media with any required encryption.

products.name: Move Cloud Servers To Different Data Center
products.descriptionHtml: Customers can request that we move a running, stopped, or archived VM to another CenturyLink Cloud data center. Part of this migration includes moving the VM hard drives, setting up the VM in the requested DC, putting it into the specified Group, and joining it to a new network.
products.details: Customers can request that a running, stopped, or archived VM be moved from one account—or data center location—to another. Covered in this work item includes moving VM hard drives, setting up the VM in the requested account or data center, putting it into the specified Group, and joining it to a new network.

products.name: Usage Reporting
products.descriptionHtml: This addresses any request for data that the customer cannot or does not want to retrieve themselves from the platform.
products.details: The Control Portal provides detailed resource utilization and user activity logs for services consumed. But for customized reporting, customers can request usage reports across the platform such as usage across account hierarchies, or historical billing information.
products.prerequisite: Specific questions that the reports are meant to answer

products.name: Disaster Recovery Testing
products.descriptionHtml: Restore premium storage servers in remote DC and verify replication is working properly. This does not include leading any customer-side business continuity execution and represents the CenturyLink Cloud portion of the DR exercise only. Servers are started in remote DCs based on account, group, and network information from the customer.
products.details:
CenturyLink Cloud’s premium storage includes an off-site replication capability. With this work item, customers can conduct tests to verify that replication is working properly. Servers are started in remote DCs based on account, Group, and network information provided by the customer.

NOTE: This work item represents the CenturyLink Cloud portion of the DR exercise only—this does not include leading any customer-side business continuity execution.

Additionally, if the standard RTO of 8 hours and RPO of 24 hours do not suit a customer’s requirements, we can consult on alternative solutions to achieve more rigorous goals.

products.name: Create Cloud Servers
products.descriptionHtml: Customers can pay CenturyLink Cloud to build servers based on the specifications provided.
products.details: Give us your specifications, and we’ll build servers in our cloud for you.

products.name: Install, Prepare or Configure Microsoft Software
products.descriptionHtml: Customers who want to run Microsoft software can purchase this work item where we mount ISOs, install software, and configure it.
products.details: Our expertise in Microsoft software runs deep—put this to work for your business. Here, our team will mount ISOs, install software, and configure it to your specifications.

products.name: Develop Blueprints
products.descriptionHtml: If a customer wants a Blueprint developed, they can pay CenturyLink Cloud to design and deploy the Blueprint for their account.
products.details:
Our cloud orchestration engine, Blueprints, allows customers to create new, complex environments in a couple of clicks—ensuring that custom apps and pre-packaged software are always deployed with ideal settings. Blueprints also eliminate human error, while significantly reducing the time to deploy solutions.

To make the most of Blueprints, strong experience with scripting technologies (like Powershell for Windows and shell scripts for Linux) is usually required. In addition, in-depth knowledge of the application in question (i.e. SharePoint, MySQL, IIS, Apache, etc.) is useful too.

If this expertise is not immediately available in-house, our Service Engineering team can help customers create Blueprints for a variety of operating systems and apps. We’ll also recommend the latest industry best practices for optimal configuration.
products.prerequisite: None, unless the Blueprint requires software paid for, or developed by the customer.

products.name: MSSQL Database Mirroring
products.descriptionHtml: Available on both the Standard (synchronous only) and Enterprise Edition of all supported versions of MSSQL. Mirroring synchronizes data from a principal DB to a mirror DB on another MSSQL instance.  Each database retains its own unique connection string, even in the case of failover. Configurable on a per-database basis.
products.details: This MSSQL availability solution is configurable on a per-database basis.  Available on both the Standard Edition (synchronous only) and Enterprise Edition of all supported versions of MSSQL. Mirroring synchronizes data from a principal DB to a mirror DB on another MSSQL instance.  Each database retains its own unique connection string, even in the case of failover.
products.prerequisite: Available to Managed Microsoft SQL service customers

products.name: MSSQL AlwaysOn Availability Groups
products.descriptionHtml: This is a high-availability and DR solution that offers additional capabilities over mirroring. Available with the Enterprise Edition of MSSQL 2012 or later, one or more databases can be added to an Availability Group for which a singular network name (listener) exists for client connectivity. Replication and failover configurations are applied to the Availability Group, which can span 2 or more nodes—one primary (writable) replica and one or more secondary (optionally readable) replicas. Although asynchronous replication is available, synchronous replication allows for automatic failover.
products.details: This is a high-availability and DR solution that offers additional capabilities over mirroring. Available with the Enterprise Edition of MSSQL 2012 or later, one or more databases can be added to an Availability Group for which a singular network name (listener) exists for client connectivity. Replication and failover configurations are applied to the Availability Group, which can span 2 or more nodes—one primary (writable) replica and one or more secondary (optionally readable) replicas. Although asynchronous replication is available, synchronous replication allows for automatic failover.
products.prerequisite: Available to Managed Microsoft SQL service customers

products.name: Add / Install Remote Desktop Services
products.descriptionHtml: Customers who want to run Microsoft Remote Desktop Services can purchase the work item. Then we provision the RDS licenses for use on CenturyLink Cloud.
products.details:
Our expertise in Microsoft software runs deep—put this to work for your business. Our team will provision Remote Desktop Services licenses for use on CenturyLink Cloud.

NOTE: while the Service Task incurs a one-time charge, the Microsoft Windows Remote Desktop Services license will be billed monthly. See the Pricing Catalog for the hourly cost of this software.

products.name: Conference Calls and Guided Troubleshooting
products.descriptionHtml: Participation on customer conference calls and guided troubleshooting sessions.
products.details: Participation on customer conference calls and guided troubleshooting sessions.

products.name: NESSUS Security Vulnerability Scanning
products.descriptionHtml: Runs security scans against one or more virtual machines to look for over 65,000 specific vulnerabilities and security gaps. Findings are then shared with the customer.
products.prerequisite: Customer provides the account alias, IP address(es), and VLAN to scan.

products.name: Direct Connect Setup
products.descriptionHtml: Provides the planning and work necessary to establish a direct connect between environments via cross connect or MPLS.
products.details: Labor required to plan, configure, and establish a direct connect (via cross connect or MPLS) between environments. NOTE: This fee just covers labor for the initial setup. Ongoing monthly usage fees are not included. These fees will vary based on the provider.
products.prerequisite: Details on the specifications of the cross-connect. For additional information, please refer to this KB article.

products.name: SafeHaven Disaster Recovery as a Service Consulting
products.descriptionHtml: SafeHaven design and technical engineering.

products.name: Service Tasks
products.descriptionHtml: Custom business and technical services performed by our team of cloud experts
products.type: Priced per project, hourly rates of $195
